translations: （不快或困难的）暂缓，暂延；（做不喜欢的事之前的）暂缓，喘息
<罕>暂缓执行（判决），暂缓履行（义务等）

sentences.sentence: There was no respite from the suffocating heat.
sentences.translation: 闷热的天气根本没有缓解。

sentences.sentence: Devaluation would only give the economy a brief respite.
sentences.translation: 货币贬值只会给经济一个短时间的暂缓。

sentences.sentence: There will be little respite from the dense data smog, which some researchers fear may be poisonous.
sentences.translation: 浓密的数据烟雾将不会有所缓解，一些研究者担心这些数据烟雾可能是有毒的。
